short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deezer is more than a music streaming platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Deezer for Chrome.


























































Enhance your browsing experience with "Deezer Customizer," a powerful yet simple extension that allows you to personalize the look of your favorite music streaming platform, Deezer.

Key Features:
Brightness Control: Easily adjust the brightness of the Deezer interface with a smooth slider, helping you set the perfect lighting for any environment, whether you're listening during the day or at night.
Background Color Customization: Change the background color of the Deezer page to suit your personal style or match your mood. You can choose any color using a convenient color picker.
Reset Option: Instantly reset the brightness and background color to the default settings at any time.
With its intuitive and user-friendly interface, "Deezer Customizer" allows you to make Deezer visually more appealing and comfortable. Perfect for those who like to personalize their online music experience!
